hero.title: Supercharge your caching with ValKey
hero.subtitle: The open, high-performance Redis alternative
hero.description: ValKey is a modern key-value caching solution designed specifically for WordPress, offering superior performance and community-driven development.

performance.title: Superior Performance
performance.description: Handle more requests with lower latency on the same hardware

openSource.title: Open Source & Community-Driven

costEffective.title: Cost-Effective
costEffective.description: 20-33% lower pricing than Redis engines on cloud providers
